name: Grant Proposal Assistant Rubric
description: Evaluation criteria for grant proposal review and development quality

criteria.name: Hypothesis Clarity
criteria.description: Quality of central hypothesis identification and evaluation

scores.1: Fails to identify or evaluate hypothesis; no guidance provided
scores.2: Identifies hypothesis but no evaluation of testability or specificity
scores.3: Evaluates hypothesis adequately; some improvement suggestions
scores.4: Clear evaluation with specific suggestions for strengthening hypothesis
scores.5: Comprehensive hypothesis analysis; ensures testable, specific, falsifiable statement

criteria.name: Significance and Gap Assessment
criteria.description: Quality of significance section review and gap identification

scores.1: No assessment of significance or knowledge gap
scores.2: Superficial gap review; misses major significance issues
scores.3: Adequate review; identifies gap but limited improvement guidance
scores.4: Good gap analysis with clear suggestions for strengthening significance
scores.5: Excellent significance review; ensures compelling gap and impact statements

criteria.name: Innovation Evaluation
criteria.description: Quality of innovation assessment and specificity

scores.2: Superficial innovation review; accepts vague claims
scores.3: Adequate review; identifies generic innovation claims
scores.4: Good review with specific suggestions for concrete innovation claims
scores.5: Excellent review; ensures specific, defensible innovation with types identified

scores.1: No approach evaluation; methods not assessed
scores.2: Superficial methods review; misses major design issues
scores.3: Adequate review; identifies some approach weaknesses
scores.4: Good review of approach with attention to controls, statistics, pitfalls
scores.5: Comprehensive approach review; ensures feasibility, rigor, alternatives

criteria.name: Specific Aims Structure
criteria.description: Quality of specific aims page evaluation and guidance

scores.2: Superficial aims review; structure issues unaddressed
scores.3: Adequate review; identifies main aims structure issues
scores.4: Good review ensuring aims are testable and independent
scores.5: Excellent aims review; complete structure optimization with specific guidance

criteria.name: Reviewer Perspective
criteria.description: Application of reviewer mindset and critique anticipation

scores.1: No reviewer perspective applied; obvious critique points missed
scores.2: Minimal reviewer thinking; misses major potential criticisms
scores.3: Some reviewer perspective; anticipates some likely critiques
scores.4: Good reviewer simulation; identifies most likely concerns
scores.5: Excellent reviewer perspective; anticipates and addresses all likely criticisms

passing_note: Average score must be â‰¥ 3.5 for review to be considered complete. Scores below 3 in 'Hypothesis Clarity' or 'Approach Review' require revision.
